Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/gmp/dist/mpn/generic/redc_2.c

1/* mpn_redc_2. Set rp[] <- up[]/R^n mod mp[]. Clobber up[].
2 mp[] is n limbs; up[] is 2n limbs.
3
4 THIS IS AN INTERNAL FUNCTION WITH A MUTABLE INTERFACE. IT IS ONLY
5 SAFE TO REACH THIS FUNCTION THROUGH DOCUMENTED INTERFACES.
6
7Copyright (C) 2000-2002, 2004, 2008, 2012 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
8
9This file is part of the GNU MP Library.
10
11The GNU MP Library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
12it under the terms of either:
13
14 * the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free
15 Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your
16 option) any later version.
17
18or
19
20 * the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software
21 Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any
22 later version.
23
24or both in parallel, as here.
25
26The GNU MP Library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
27WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
28or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License
29for more details.
30
31You should have received copies of the GNU General Public License and the
32GNU Lesser General Public License along with the GNU MP Library. If not,
33see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
34
35#include "gmp.h"
36#include "gmp-impl.h"
37#include "longlong.h"
38
39
40#if GMP_NAIL_BITS != 0
41you lose
42#endif
43
44/* For testing purposes, define our own mpn_addmul_2 if there is none already
45 available. */
46#ifndef HAVE_NATIVE_mpn_addmul_2
47#undef mpn_addmul_2
48static mp_limb_t
49mpn_addmul_2 (mp_ptr rp, mp_srcptr up, mp_size_t n, mp_srcptr vp)
50{
51 rp[n] = mpn_addmul_1 (rp, up, n, vp[0]);
52 return mpn_addmul_1 (rp + 1, up, n, vp[1]);
53}
54#endif
55
56#if defined (__GNUC__) && ! defined (NO_ASM) \
57 && defined (__ia64) && W_TYPE_SIZE == 64
58#define umul2low(ph, pl, uh, ul, vh, vl) \
59 do { \
60 mp_limb_t _ph, _pl; \
61 __asm__ ("xma.hu %0 = %3, %5, f0\n\t" \
62 "xma.l %1 = %3, %5, f0\n\t" \
63 ";;\n\t" \
64 "xma.l %0 = %3, %4, %0\n\t" \
65 ";;\n\t" \
66 "xma.l %0 = %2, %5, %0" \
67 : "=&f" (ph), "=&f" (pl) \
68 : "f" (uh), "f" (ul), "f" (vh), "f" (vl)); \
69 } while (0)
70#endif
71
72#ifndef umul2low
73#define umul2low(ph, pl, uh, ul, vh, vl) \
74 do { \
75 mp_limb_t _ph, _pl; \
76 umul_ppmm (_ph, _pl, ul, vl); \
77 (ph) = _ph + (ul) * (vh) + (uh) * (vl); \
78 (pl) = _pl; \
79 } while (0)
80#endif
81
82mp_limb_t
83mpn_redc_2 (mp_ptr rp, mp_ptr up, mp_srcptr mp, mp_size_t n, mp_srcptr mip)
84{
85 mp_limb_t q[2];
86 mp_size_t j;
87 mp_limb_t upn;
88 mp_limb_t cy;
89
90 ASSERT (n > 0);
91 ASSERT_MPN (up, 2*n);
92
93 if ((n & 1) != 0)
94 {
95 up[0] = mpn_addmul_1 (up, mp, n, (up[0] * mip[0]) & GMP_NUMB_MASK);
96 up++;
97 }
98
99 for (j = n - 2; j >= 0; j -= 2)
100 {
101 umul2low (q[1], q[0], mip[1], mip[0], up[1], up[0]);
102 upn = up[n]; /* mpn_addmul_2 overwrites this */
103 up[1] = mpn_addmul_2 (up, mp, n, q);
104 up[0] = up[n];
105 up[n] = upn;
106 up += 2;
107 }
108
109 cy = mpn_add_n (rp, up, up - n, n);
110 return cy;
111}
112
